title: Google sends Apple a direct message about iMessage at IO
content:
It’s no secret that Apple tends to stick to itsÂ proprietary solutions when it comes to its hardware and software. For example, the company still includes the Lightning port on all of the iPhones it puts out. In the meantime, most smartphone manufacturers have already switched to USB Type-C ports. It’s a universal charger that works

The post Google sends Apple a direct message about iMessage at IO appeared first on XDA.
description: Google has thrown shade at Apple during its I/O 2022's main keynote for not supporting Rich Communication Services (RCS).
